explanation: [0-0] A little girl in a brown teddy bear jumpsuit is sitting on a gray sofa, with two pigtails and bare feet. She is holding a mobile phone in her left hand and looking at the screen. The room is bright and modern with white walls, and there is a large silver ball next to the sofa.

[0-6] The little girl shakes her head from side to side while looking at the phone.
